tool_description: Create an image with the text specified. Customize colors, font and margin
name: Convert text to image
title: Convert text to image

api_list.name: Convert text to image
api_list.description: Create a PNG image with the text and format specified: font color, background color, font, font size and margin.

required_parameters.name: margin
required_parameters.description: This margin applies to the 4 boundaries.

required_parameters.name: font
required_parameters.description:
The value must be a .ttf filename following the files available at Google Fonts website.
The fonts available are: Abel, Anton, Arimo, Barlow, Barlow_Condensed, Bebas_Neue, Bitter, Cabin, Cairo, Dancing_Script, DM_Sans, Dosis, EB_Garamond, Fira_Sans, Fjalla_One, Heebo, Hind, Hind_Madurai, Hind_Siliguri, IBM_Plex_Sans, Inconsolata, Inter, Josefin_Sans, Karla, Lato, Libre_Baskerville, Libre_Franklin, Lobster, Lora, Merriweather, Montserrat, Mukta, Mulish, Nanum_Gothic, Noto_Sans_JP, Noto_Serif, Nunito, Nunito_Sans, Open_Sans, Open_Sans_Condensed, Oswald, Overpass, Oxygen, Playfair_Display, Poppins, Prompt, PT_Sans, PT_Sans_Narrow, PT_Serif, Quicksand, Raleway, Roboto, Roboto_Condensed, Roboto_Mono, Roboto_Slab, Rubik, Source_Code_Pro, Source_Sans_Pro, Source_Serif_Pro, Titillium_Web, Ubuntu, Varela_Round, Work_Sans, Yanone_Kaffeesatz.
You can request more fonts to be added.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text may include %0A to create a new line of text
